mapper.select: SELECT MERGE_ID ,CODE ,STATUS ,CREATOR ,TO_CHAR(CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED ,UPDATOR ,UPDATED ,PATH ,TO_CHAR(CONTRACT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONTRACT_DATE ,PRODUCT_CODE ,REGISTRATION_NUM FROM MCP_TERMS_MERGE_LI WHERE REGISTRATION_NUM <=10
select * from ( select row_number() over (order by status) num , A.* from mcp_terms_merge_li A order by status ) where num between 2 and 10
